cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_PORT_FOR_S1U to 99999 exceeds the valid port range (0-65535), causing network interface configuration errors.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 exceeds the valid power range for SSB block power, causing physical layer configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100 超過 SSB 區塊功率的有效範圍，會導致物理層配置錯誤。
